from notebookutils import mssparkutils

# Builds protected characteristic DIMs
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_diversity_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_disability_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_religion_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_sxo_dim')
# Builds protected characteristic FACT
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_secure_info_fact') #-- where is it?

# Builds employee DIMS
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_employee_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_PersonnelArea_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_PersonnelSubArea_dim')
#mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/EmployeeLeavers_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_WorkSchedule_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_Specialism_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_LeaveEntitlement_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_Absence_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_contract_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_payband_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_position_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_PINS_Location_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_OrganisationalUnit_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_CostCenter_Dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_employeegroup_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_payrollarea_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/hr_Employee_HR_Hierarchy_Dim')

# Build full FACT table
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/SAP-HR/HR_Record_Fact')
